title: Integrated Instructional Design for Online Certification in Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment integrating field-oriented technologies such as cloud computing, blockchain, and data analysis into an assessment system linked to online certification courses.

learning_goals: Learners complete over 80% of engineering-related online certification courses provided on the MOOC platform and obtain certificates
Learners apply technical knowledge acquired from online certification courses to solve at least three real engineering problems

Learners synthesize online certification activities (3 quizzes, 2 discussions) and offline class content (5 topic-based lectures) over four weeks to write a 10-page final project report in APA format, deliver a 10-minute presentation meeting peer and instructor evaluation criteria (at least 14/20 points), and pass the evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
